properties.template:
Laboratory Result Report

BASIC METABOLIC PANEL

Result Date: 09/30/2009

Stage: Final


Patient Demographics

MRN: ${maps.get('objPID.patientId')}
Name: ${maps.get('objPID.patientLastName')}, ${maps.get('objPID.patientFirstName')}
Date Of Birth: ${maps.get('objPID.dateOfBirth')}
Address: ${maps.get('objPID.address')}
Account: ${maps.get('objPID.accountNumber')}

Encounter - Visit

Type: Outpatient
Attending: Marzena Bieniek MD
Visit Num: 0234567890
Arrived: 08/30/2017 14:30
Departed: 08/30/2017 15:30

Order Results


Test Result Flag Reference Range
GLUCOSE,RANDOM 100 mg/dL N 74-106 mg/dL
BLOOD UREA NITROGEN 10 mg/dL N 9-20 mg/dL
CREATININE 3.0 mg/dL H 0.8-1.5 mg/dL
  • Ordered By: CARL STRANGE MD
  • Stage: Final

channel.name: XML to HTML
channel.description: 2018-04-22 v1.13 JER - Modified the "Call getAuthor -> Set Author Channel Map variables" transformer, added a Pre-Processor script and updated the GetAssignedEntity. 2018-02-25 v1.11 JER - Added getAssignedAuthor, modified getAssignedEntity, newly added the getXdsAuthorPerson and modified Call getPerformer, getAuthor and getEncounters (modified) for additional error handling and checking for undefined, null and object length characteristics. 2018-02-16 v1.10 JER - Modified Code templates: getPerformer and getAuthorPerson and Source Transformer: Call getAuthor -> Set Author Channel Map variables. 2018-02-15 v1.9 JER - Modified getAuthorPerson for improved handling using typeof functions, getPerformer modified from E4X to Rhino standard Javascript notation and getServiceEvent modified to include capturing the ClassCode and DisplayName attributes 2018-02-13 v1.8 JER - Modified the destination connector outbound template to reference as the receipent To: https://certhub.1click2care.net:20000/repository , added default values for performerAuthorRole and performerAuthorSpeciality if none is provided for the Call getPerformer and getAuthors -> Set Performer and Authors Channel Map variables transformer, verified Response transformer included AND readded the removed channelMap.put for the encodedCCD to destination [Encoded the CCD] transformer. 2018-02-13 v1.7.1 JER - Modified the "Encoded the CCD" destination transformer to Stringify the encData.length() object and will remove/truncate decimal 2018-02-12 v1.7 JER - Modified the Destination Transformer: Encoded the CCD to output the bytes size length of the encoded CCD used as encFileSize in Soap Xds Metadata versus using the sourceMap fileSize determined from channel source File Reader connector. 2018-02-12 v1.6 JER - Improved handling of many components: ServiceStartTime, ServiceStopTime, XdsSubmissionSet Entry_UUID and included additional logical on handling multiple documentationOf\serviceEvents. 2018-02-07 v1.5 JER - Modified by including additional typeof element 'undefined' checks on the getPerformer code-template and the Call getPerformer transformer to resolve and minimize "TypeError: Cannot read property "functionDisplayName" from undefined" 2018-02-01 JER (v1.4) - Modified a few Code-templates, created a destination HTTP Web Sender connect for NIST XD* validation testing and made a few minor adjustments to the Destination Web Server Sender Inbound Message Template. Passed NIST XD* metadata IHE XDS.b ITI-41 PnR Set-b (no codes check) validation. 2018-01-31 JER (v1.3) - Modified to set the sourceOid from the \ClinicalDocument\author\assignedAuthor\representedOrganization\id\@root, included getPerformer to store serviceEvent\performer instances and channel Map the Web Service response. 2018-01-30 JER (v1.2) - Modified by including checks for undefined and will set to no string {} where applicable and disabled the Strip Namespaces on the Destinations Web Server Sender Inbound Message Template. 2018-01-30 JER (v1.1) - Modified the Source transformer named "Call getClinicalDocumentInfo..." channelMap.put for key: 'confCodeDisplayName' to reference getHL7v3Confidentiality displayName property. 2018-01-29 JER (v1.0) - Import Code Templates, modified the Source type to File Reader from Channel Reader and re-enabled the Medicity_Repository destination Web Service Sender.

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Call getClinicalDocumentInfo -> Set Document Channel Map variables
Call getEncounter or fallback to getServiceEvent -> Set Service Event Channel Map variables
Call getPatientRole -> Set Patient Channel Map variables
Call getAuthor -> Set Author Channel Map variables
Call getPerformer, getAuthors and getEncounters -> Set Performer and Authors Channel Map variables
Set Xds Parameters
Set to MobileMD Document Source and Patient Local AssigningAuthority OIDs

properties.template: <s:Envelope xmlns:s="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:a="http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing"> <s:Header> <a:Action s:mustUnderstand="1">urn:ihe:iti:2007:ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSet-b</a:Action> <a:MessageID>${uuid}</a:MessageID> <a:ReplyTo> <a:Address>http://www.w3.org/2005/08/addressing/anonymous</a:Address> </a:ReplyTo> <a:To s:mustUnderstand="1">https://certhub.1click2care.net:20000/repository</a:To> </s:Header> <s:Body> <ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSetRequest xsi:schemaLocation="urn:ihe:iti:xds-b:2007 ../../schema/IHE/XDS.b_DocumentRepository.xsd" xmlns="urn:ihe:iti:xds-b:2007" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:lcm="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:xsd:lcm:3.0" xmlns:rim="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:xsd:rim:3.0" xmlns:rs="urn:oasis:names:tc:ebxml-regrep:xsd:rs:3.0"> <lcm:SubmitObjectsRequest> <rim:RegistryObjectList> <rim:ExtrinsicObject id="${extrinsicObjectUUID}" mimeType="text/xml" objectType="urn:uuid:7edca82f-054d-47f2-a032-9b2a5b5186c1"> <rim:Slot name="creationTime"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${documentCreationTime}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="languageCode"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${languageCode}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="serviceStartTime"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${serviceStartTime}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="serviceStopTime"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${serviceStopTime}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="sourcePatientId"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientId}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="sourcePatientInfo"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientInfo_pid3}</rim:Value> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientInfo_pid5}</rim:Value> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientInfo_pid7}</rim:Value> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientInfo_pid8}</rim:Value> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientInfo_pid11}</rim:Value> <rim:Value>${sourcePatientInfo_pid13}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="size"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${encFileSize}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="hash"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${ccdHash}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="${documentTitle}"/> </rim:Name> <rim:Description/> <rim:Classification id="${uuid}" classificationScheme="urn:uuid:93606bcf-9494-43ec-9b4e-a7748d1a838d" classifiedObject="${extrinsicObjectUUID}"> <rim:Slot name="authorPerson"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${strAuthorPerson}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="authorInstitution"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${authorInstitution}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="authorRole"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${performerAuthorRole}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="authorSpecialty"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${performerAuthorSpeciality}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> </rim:Classification> <rim:Classification id="${uuid}" <rim:Value>${documentCodeSystemOid}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="${documentCodeDisplayName}"/> </rim:Name> </rim:Classification> <rim:Classification <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${confCodeSystemOid}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="${confCodeDisplayName}"/> </rim:Name> </rim:Classification> nodeRepresentation="urn:hl7-org:sdwg:ccda-structuredBody:1.1"> <rim:Slot name="codingScheme"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.2.3</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="C-CDA R1.1 Continuity of Care Document (CCD)"/> </rim:Name> </rim:Classification> <rim:Classification id="${uuid}" classificationScheme="urn:uuid:f33fb8ac-18af-42cc-ae0e-ed0b0bdb91e1" classifiedObject="${extrinsicObjectUUID}" nodeRepresentation="35971002"> <rim:Slot name="codingScheme"> <rim:ValueList> </rim:ExtrinsicObject> <rim:RegistryPackage id="${submissionSetUUID}"> <rim:Slot name="submissionTime"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${currentDateTime}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="Submission Set"/> </rim:Name> <rim:Description> <rim:LocalizedString value="A collection of CDA documents"/> </rim:Description> <rim:Classification id="${uuid}" classificationScheme="urn:uuid:a7058bb9-b4e4-4307-ba5b-e3f0ab85e12d" classifiedObject="${submissionSetUUID}"> <rim:Slot name="authorPerson"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${strAuthorPerson}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="authorInstitution"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${authorInstitution}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Slot name="authorRole"> <rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> </rim:Classification> <rim:Classification id="${uuid}" classificationScheme="urn:uuid:aa543740-bdda-424e-8c96-df4873be8500" classifiedObject="${submissionSetUUID}" nodeRepresentation="${documentCode}"> <rim:Slot name="codingScheme"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>${documentCodeSystemOid}</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="${documentCodeDisplayName}"/> </rim:Name> </rim:Classification> <rim:ExternalIdentifier id="${uuid}" registryObject="${submissionSetUUID}" identificationScheme="urn:uuid:96fdda7c-d067-4183-912e-bf5ee74998a8" value="${submissionSetUniqueId}"> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="XDSSubmissionSet.uniqueId"/> </rim:Name> </rim:ExternalIdentifier> <rim:ExternalIdentifier id="${uuid}" registryObject="${submissionSetUUID}" identificationScheme="urn:uuid:554ac39e-e3fe-47fe-b233-965d2a147832" value="${sourceOid}"> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="XDSSubmissionSet.sourceId"/> </rim:Name> </rim:ExternalIdentifier> <rim:ExternalIdentifier id="${uuid}" registryObject="${submissionSetUUID}" identificationScheme="urn:uuid:6b5aea1a-874d-4603-a4bc-96a0a7b38446" value="${sourcePatientId}"> <rim:Name> <rim:LocalizedString value="XDSSubmissionSet.patientId"/> </rim:Name> </rim:ExternalIdentifier> </rim:RegistryPackage> <rim:Classification id="${uuid}" classifiedObject="${submissionSetUUID}" classificationNode="urn:uuid:a54d6aa5-d40d-43f9-88c5-b4633d873bdd"/> <rim:Association id="${uuid}" associationType="HasMember" sourceObject="${submissionSetUUID}" targetObject="${extrinsicObjectUUID}"> <rim:Slot name="SubmissionSetStatus"> <rim:ValueList> <rim:Value>Original</rim:Value> </rim:ValueList> </rim:Slot> </rim:Association> </rim:RegistryObjectList> </lcm:SubmitObjectsRequest> <Document id="${extrinsicObjectUUID}">${encodedCCD}</Document> </ProvideAndRegisterDocumentSetRequest> </s:Body> </s:Envelope>

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: classificationUUID
externalIdentifierUUID
sourcePatientId
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: channelMap.put('sourcePatientId',$('MPI_PatientIdExtension')+"^^^&"+$('MPI_PatientIdRoot')+"&ISO");

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Get Xds Response

connector.name: PIX ITI-45 SOAP Query CHS Wyoming Valley Endpoint

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: PRPA_IN201309UV02 Query
connectorMessage response

connector.name: PIX ITI-45 HTTPS Query CHS Wyoming Valley Endpoint

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: PRPA_IN201309UV02 Query
connectorMessage response
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script: var response = connectorMessage.getEncodedData() channelMap.put('response',response);

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: PRPA_IN201309UV02 Query
connectorMessage response

Get DB connection to specified environment
Check if String contains HTTP code
Check if the PDF is valid
Convert JSON date to HL7v2 date

Convert FHIR codes to HL7v2 codes
